CustomField.description: Enables the slack message sent to the public group configured for the CRP Team when Create Reference Profile is enabled for Reference Lead Finder and a new Reference Profile is created as a result of a Reference Lead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables the slack message sent to the public group configured for the CRP Team when Create Reference Profile is enabled for Reference Lead Finder and a new Reference Profile is created as a result of a Reference Lead.
CustomField.label: Profile Creation via RLF Slack
